member.name: T:Fusee.SceneManagement.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Provides scene management functionality for 3D graphics rendering and object relationships.

member.name: T:Fusee.SceneManagement.ActionCode
member.summary: ActionCode class grants access to an SceneEntities Components. Supported: DeltaTime, Input recognition

member.name: T:Fusee.SceneManagement.Component
member.summary: Base class from which all Components are derived.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.Component.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Whitout setting a SceneEntity.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.Component.#ctor(Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneEntity)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a SceneEntity.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.Component.Accept(Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneVisitor)
member.summary: Passes the Component to the SceneVisitor which decides what to do with that Component.

member.name: P:Fusee.SceneManagement.Component.SceneEntity
member.summary: Gets or sets the scene entity of this Component.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.ActionCode.Init(Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneEntity)
member.summary: Init is called upon creation of an ActionCode Object and utilizes the access to a SceneEntitie's transform and renderer objects.
member.param: The owner entity of this component.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.ActionCode.TraverseForRendering(Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneVisitorRendering)
member.summary: Traverse is giving the Update routine access to the DeltaTime and the Input class and afterwards executes the Update routine.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.ActionCode.Start
member.summary: Start is called only once. At the time of the call other objects inside the scene are already initialized.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.ActionCode.Update
member.summary: Update is called every frame. Please avoid placing heavy calculations inside this Function.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.ActionCode.Accept(Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneVisitor)
member.summary: Accept is called by the current visitor. This function is currently used for traversal and search algorithms by the SceneManager object.
member.param: The visitor that is currently traversing the scene.

member.name: T:Fusee.SceneManagement.Camera
member.summary: This class is derived from Component and set's a Camera in the scene.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.Camera.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. The ViewMatrix will be set to float4x4 identity matrix.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.Camera.#ctor(Fusee.SceneManagement.Transformation)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. The ViewMatrix will be set to a provided float 4x4 matrix.
member.param: The matrix that will become the Viewmatrix.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.Camera.#ctor(Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneEntity)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. The SceneEntity will be set to apply its transformation to the Camera Component.
member.param: The SceneEntity where the Camera Component is attached to.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.Camera.ProjectionType(Fusee.SceneManagement.Projection)
member.summary: Sets the projection type of the Camera object.
member.param: The Projection enum whereby Projection.Perspective or Projection.Orthographic is available.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.Camera.Resize
member.summary: This is called by the Resize function inside the entry point object in order to update the Cameras view frustum dimensions upon window resizing.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.Camera.Resize(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the Cameras view frustum dimensions with width and height units as pixels.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.Camera.SubmitWork
member.summary: TraverseForRendering add's Camera to the lightqueue.
member.returns: A RenderingCamera Object that passes the Camera to the renderContext.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.Camera.Accept(Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneVisitor)
member.summary: Accept is called by the current visitor. This function is currently used for traversal and search algorithms by the SceneManager object.
member.param: The visitor that is currently traversing the scene.

member.name: P:Fusee.SceneManagement.Camera.ViewMatrix
member.summary: Allows to set and get the Viewmatrix of the Camera.

member.name: P:Fusee.SceneManagement.Camera.Width
member.summary: Sets the Cameras view width in pixels.

member.name: P:Fusee.SceneManagement.Camera.Height
member.summary: Sets the Cameras view height in pixels.

member.name: P:Fusee.SceneManagement.Camera.FieldOfView
member.summary: Sets the Cameras field of View angle. Recommended default value is 60 (degrees).

member.name: P:Fusee.SceneManagement.Camera.Near
member.summary: Sets the Cameras near plane. The near plane describes the minimum distance from Camera to an object in scene. If the cameras distance to an object is smaller than the near value is set to, the scene object will not be rendered.

member.name: P:Fusee.SceneManagement.Camera.Far
member.summary: Sets the Cameras far plane. The far plane describes the maximum distance from Camera to an object in scene. Scene objects that are further away than the far value will not be rendered.

member.name: P:Fusee.SceneManagement.Camera.AspectRatio
member.summary: Sets the Cameras aspect ratio. The aspect ratio is the width to height relation of the screen, e.g. 16:9 (aspectratio=16/9).

member.name: T:Fusee.SceneManagement.DirectionalLight
member.summary: This class is derived from Light and set's a Directionallight in the scene. A direction, a color and the position of the lightsource is needed.

member.name: T:Fusee.SceneManagement.Light
member.summary: Light is the base class for all lightsources in the scene. All lights are derived from this class and this class is derived from Component.

member.name: F:Fusee.SceneManagement.Light._type
member.summary: The .

member.name: F:Fusee.SceneManagement.Light._position
member.summary: The position in the scene.

member.name: F:Fusee.SceneManagement.Light._direction
member.summary: The direction of the light along the z-axis.

member.name: F:Fusee.SceneManagement.Light._diffuseColor
member.summary: The diffuse light color.

member.name: F:Fusee.SceneManagement.Light._ambientColor
member.summary: The ambient light color.

member.name: F:Fusee.SceneManagement.Light._specularColor
member.summary: The specular light color.

member.name: F:Fusee.SceneManagement.Light._channel
member.summary: The light channel (0-7).

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.Light.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a light object.

member.name: T:Fusee.SceneManagement.Light.LightType
member.summary: Enums for lighttypes at the moment there are 3

member.name: F:Fusee.SceneManagement.Light.LightType.Disabled
member.summary: Disabled Light = 0

member.name: F:Fusee.SceneManagement.Light.LightType.Directional
member.summary: Directional = 1

member.name: F:Fusee.SceneManagement.Light.LightType.Point
member.summary: Point = 1

member.name: F:Fusee.SceneManagement.Light.LightType.Spot
member.summary: Spot = 2

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.DirectionalLight.#ctor(Fusee.Math.float3,Fusee.Math.float4,Fusee.Math.float4,Fusee.Math.float4,Fusee.Math.float3,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a directional light in the scene. Direction, color, position, and channel is needed. It is possible to set up to 8 lights in the scene.
member.param: The memory space of the light.(0 - 7)

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.DirectionalLight.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a directional light in the scene. Direction, color and position will get standart values. Channel is needed. It is possible to set up to 8 lights in the scene.
member.param: The memory space of the light(0 - 7).

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.DirectionalLight.TraverseForRendering(Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneVisitorRendering)
member.summary: TraverseForRendering add's Directionallight to the light queue.
member.param: The SceneVisitorRendering object that is passing the light information to the rendeirng queue.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.DirectionalLight.Accept(Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneVisitor)
member.summary: Accept is called by the current visitor. This function is currently used for traversal and search algorithms by the SceneManager object.
member.param: The visitor that is currently traversing the scene.

member.name: T:Fusee.SceneManagement.Material
member.summary: The Material class holds information about its Shaderprogram, Texture Data and Shader parameters. This class is in prototype state.

member.name: F:Fusee.SceneManagement.Material.imgData
member.summary: The img data of the first image.

member.name: F:Fusee.SceneManagement.Material.imgData2
member.summary: The img data of the second image.

member.name: F:Fusee.SceneManagement.Material.iTex
member.summary: The for the first texture.

member.name: F:Fusee.SceneManagement.Material.iTex2
member.summary: The for the second texture.

member.name: F:Fusee.SceneManagement.Material._vColorParam
member.summary: The color parameter that will be passed into the shader.

member.name: F:Fusee.SceneManagement.Material._texture1Param
member.summary: The texture parameter that will be passed into the shader.

member.name: F:Fusee.SceneManagement.Material.sp
member.summary: The that is used to render this material.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.Material.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.Material.#ctor(Fusee.Engine.ShaderProgram)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The Shaderprogram of this material instance.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.Material.Update(Fusee.Engine.RenderContext)
member.summary: Sets the materials shaderprogram onto the rendercontext upon render time.
member.param: The render context that handles the drawing of the application.

member.name: T:Fusee.SceneManagement.PointLight
member.summary: This class is derived from Light and set's a Pointlight in the scene. A color and the position of the lightsource are needed.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.PointLight.#ctor(Fusee.Math.float3,Fusee.Math.float4,Fusee.Math.float4,Fusee.Math.float4,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Position, color and channel are needed.
member.param: The memory space of the light(0 - 7).

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.PointLight.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Only the channel is needed. Other params will be set to default value.
member.param: The memory space of the light(0 - 7).

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.PointLight.#ctor(Fusee.Math.float4,Fusee.Math.float3,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a point light in the scene. Position, color, position, and channel is needed. It is possible to set up to 8 lights in the scene.
member.param: The memory space of the light.(0 - 7)

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.PointLight.TraverseForRendering(Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneVisitorRendering)
member.summary: Traverses this pointligt for rendering. The light information is passed to the SceneVisitorRendering.
member.param: The scene visitor rendering object grabs the light information upon render time.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.PointLight.Accept(Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneVisitor)
member.summary: Passes the Component to the SceneVisitor which decides what to do with that Component.
member.param: The SceneVisitor instance updates the position of this pointlight according to the transformation of the pointlights parent.

member.name: T:Fusee.SceneManagement.RenderCamera
member.summary: RenderCamera is derived from Renderjob and is responible for passing the Camera towards the RenderContext.

member.name: T:Fusee.SceneManagement.RenderJob
member.summary: Provides the virtual SubmitWork method.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.RenderJob.SubmitWork(Fusee.Engine.RenderContext)
member.summary: The SubmitWork method will be overwritten by a visited Component that "want's" to be rendered. Therefore a RenderContext is needed.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.RenderCamera.#ctor(Fusee.Math.float4x4,Fusee.Math.float4x4,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Needs the ViewMatrix of a Camera.
member.param: The matrix that will be the new ViewMatrix.
The matrix that will be the new projection.
True if values have changed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.RenderCamera.SubmitWork(Fusee.Engine.RenderContext)
member.summary: Sets the ViewMatrix in the RenderContext.
member.param: The RenderContext that handles the rendering.

member.name: T:Fusee.SceneManagement.RenderDirectionalLight
member.summary: RednerDirectionalLight is derived from Renderjob and is responible for passing the DirectionalLight towards the RenderContext.

member.param: The memory space of the light(0 - 7).

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.RenderDirectionalLight.SubmitWork(Fusee.Engine.RenderContext)
member.summary: Passes directionallight's parameters to RenderContext.

member.name: T:Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneManager
member.summary: The SceneManager class handles the rendering of the scene.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneManager.AddSceneEntity(Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneEntity)
member.summary: Adds a to the scene.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneManager.AddCamera(Fusee.SceneManagement.RenderCamera)
member.summary: Adds the camera to the rendering queue [1].
member.param: The RenderCamera object that holds the Projection and Transformation matrix.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneManager.Traverse(Fusee.Engine.RenderCanvas)
member.summary: Traverses the scene's entities with their corresponding components in order to construct an 3D world. This function is called every frame.
member.param: The render canvas that presents the final render image.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneManager.UpdateLights
member.summary: Updates the lights information before the scene is rendered.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneManager.AddRenderJob(Fusee.SceneManagement.RenderJob)
member.summary: Adds a render job to the render queue[2].

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneManager.AddLightJob(Fusee.SceneManagement.RenderJob)
member.summary: Adds a light job to the light queue [0].

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneManager.FindSceneEntity(System.String)
member.summary: Finds the scene entity inside the current scene.
member.param: The name of the SceneEntity that needs to be found.
member.returns: On successful search the first SceneEntity that has the name is returned.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneManager.StartActionCode
member.summary: Initializes all objects in the scene and calls their Start method once.

member.name: P:Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneManager.Manager
member.summary: Gets the Singleton SceneManager instance.

member.name: P:Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneManager.RC
member.summary: Gets or sets(only once) a RenderContext instance.

member.name: T:Fusee.SceneManagement.RenderRenderer
member.summary: Creates a RendererRenderer Component that will be passed to the RenderContext as the current shaderprogram.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.RenderRenderer.#ctor(Fusee.SceneManagement.Renderer)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Needs to be provided with a Renderer Component.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.RenderRenderer.SubmitWork(Fusee.Engine.RenderContext)
member.summary: Overwrites the SubmitWork method of RenderJob class. Render Component will get shaders and materials and passed to the RenderContextImplementation.

member.name: T:Fusee.SceneManagement.RenderMatrix
member.summary: Creates a float4x4 matrix that will be passed to the RenderContext.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.RenderMatrix.#ctor(Fusee.Math.float4x4)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Needs to be provided with a matrix that needs to be rendered.
member.param: The matrix that need's to be rendered e.g. the matrix of a object in scene.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.RenderMatrix.SubmitWork(Fusee.Engine.RenderContext)
member.summary: The SubmitWork method will be overwritten by a visited Component that "want's" to be rendered. Therefore a RenderContext is needed.

member.name: T:Fusee.SceneManagement.RenderMesh
member.summary: Creates a mesh that will be passed to the RenderContext.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.RenderMesh.#ctor(Fusee.Engine.Mesh)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Needs to be provided with a mesh that needs to be rendered.
member.param: The mesh that need's to be rendered e.g. the mesh of a ingame object.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.RenderMesh.SubmitWork(Fusee.Engine.RenderContext)
member.summary: Overwrites the SubmitWork method of RenderJob class. The mesh will be provided with everything it need's and passed to RenderContextImplementation.

member.name: T:Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneEntity
member.summary: The SceneEntity class can contain components that do different tasks during runtime in order to create a scene. Every SceneEntity automatically has a transform component which is used for the 3D orientation. It is required to give a SceneEntity a name in order to use the search algorithms of during runtime.

member.name: F:Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneEntity.name
member.summary: The name of the SceneEntity.

member.name: F:Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneEntity.tag
member.summary: The tag of the SceneEntity.

member.summary: The transform Component of the SceneEntity.

member.summary: The renderer Component of the SceneEntity.

member.summary: The _parent SceneEntity of the current SceneEntity.

member.summary: The _child scene entities of the current SceneEntity.

member.summary: The components of the current SceneEntity.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneEntity.TraverseForRendering(Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneVisitor)
member.summary: Traverses through the current SceneEntities components and through its children and their components.
member.param: The scene visitor rendering that grabs the informations from the SceneEntity that are required to render it.

member.summary: Accepts the specified SceneVisitor in order to pass informations to it.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneEntity.AddComponent(Fusee.SceneManagement.Component)
member.summary: Adds a component to the SceneEntity.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneEntity.AddChild(Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneEntity)
member.summary: Adds a child SceneEntity to the current SceneEntity. This method creates a relation between SceneEntities that is required for the transformation order.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneEntity.GetChildren
member.summary: Gets all child SceneEntities of the current SceneEntity. If no children are attached to this SceneEntity null is returned.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneEntity.GetComponent``1
member.summary: Gets the specified type of Component from the SceneEntity.
member.typeparam: The specified type. This has to be a derivate of the class.
member.returns: The first component of the specified type if one is found, otherwise null.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneEntity.GetComponents``1
member.summary: Gets all components of specified type from this current SceneEntity.
member.typeparam: This is the type of the Component. The type in this case can be any derivate of the Component class, e.g.
member.returns: On successful search a list of Components of specified type is returned.

member.name: M:Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneEntity.FindSceneEntity(System.String)
member.summary: Finds a SceneEntity in the scene. This method is an access point to FindSceneEntity method inside .
member.returns: On successful search the first SceneEntity with the selected name is returned.

member.name: P:Fusee.SceneManagement.SceneEntity.parent
member.summary: Gets or sets the parent SceneEntity. Null is returned if this SceneEntity doesn't have a parent.

member.summary: The SceneVisitor is the base class for Scene traversing functions
